title: Click me!
text:
Clicking on notes will bring them back up so you can view the details of notes from clicking on their title.

To start a new note, click the pencil icon in the top right corner. When you're done typing up your note, clicking on the save icon in the same place will save your note to the sidebar where you can view it again at any time in the same way you viewed this one!

When you no longer need a note, simply click on the trash icon next to the unwanted note's title and it will be no longer.
